name: WorkshopCoffee
0:
”Alexa, open Workshop Coffee”
”Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for a Brew Guide”
”Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for the Aeropress Brew Guide”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: workshop coffee
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Workshop Coffee is here to help you brew the perfect cup of coffee at home. Whether you’re new to home brewing, want to brush up on your skills, or looking to try out a different brewing method, London's Workshop Coffee takes you from bean to brew with simple to follow step-by-step guides.

Learn how to use an Aeropress, V60, Moccamaster, Clever Dripper or French Press, or discover the Tasting Tips section, where Workshop Coffee’s Head of Quality takes you through the taste, flavours and aromas you should be looking out for in your cup. 

You can also learn all about London-based Workshop Coffee. In the About Us section you can find out about how we roast, source and produce our coffee, along with how our U.K. subscriptions work and where to find us.

To get started, simply say ‘Alexa, open Workshop Coffee’. 

To jump straight to any one of the 5 Brew Guides say:
‘Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for the Aeropress Brew Guide.’
‘Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for the V60 Brew Guide.’
‘Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for the Moccamaster Brew Guide.’
‘Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for the Clever Dripper Brew Guide.’
‘Alexa, ask Workshop Coffee for the French Press Brew Guide.’

Please note, as this is a U.K. skill, the measurements are in metric units (grams and millilitres).

-

To discover even more about Workshop Coffee, please visit www.workshopcoffee.com. 

If you have any feedback on the skill, we’d love to hear what you think, so email us at: shop@workshopcoffee.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
